title: Production of Rye in Canada 2021
summary: The graph illustrates the Production of Rye in Canada the year 2021 .
The Production is very low in the first third of the year , before it rises sharply until October , reaching a maximum of 20000 Tonnes .
Then the Production decreased again for the remaining months of the year .
gold: The production of Rye in Canada in 2021 is measured in Tonnes as shown in the line chart . The production stays mostly constant throughout the year except for a rapid climb from July to August and a rapid drop from August to October .
